@graph.caption: Vegan Mexican shrimp cocktail is a mixture of artichoke hearts, onion, cucumber, avocado, and cilantro tossed with a spicy lime tomato sauce.

@graph.name: Vegan Mexican Shrimp Cocktail « Dora's Table
@graph.description: Vegan Mexican shrimp cocktail is a mixture of artichoke hearts, onion, cucumber, avocado, and cilantro tossed with a spicy lime tomato sauce.

@graph.name: Dora S.
@graph.description: Dora is the founder, recipe developer, and photographer at Dora's Table and Mi Mero Mole. Born and raised in Mexico and a graduate of the Culinary Institute of America in New York, she adopted a vegan (plant-based) diet to take control of her health.

@graph.name: Vegan Mexican Shrimp Cocktail
@graph.description: With a little creativity I was able to recreate my favorite cóctel de camarón. A mixture of artichoke hearts, onion, diced cucumber, avocado, and cilantro are tossed with a spicy lime tomato sauce.
recipeIngredient: 2 cans (14 oz.) Artichoke hearts, packed in water (drained)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut off the bottom part of the artichoke hearts, if they are tough, and then chop the rest into chunks or medium cubes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut off the bottom part of the artichoke hearts, if they are tough, and then chop the rest into chunks or medium cubes.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the artichokes, onion, cucumber, avocado, cilantro, and chopped seaweed
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine the artichokes, onion, cucumber, avocado, cilantro, and chopped seaweed

recipeInstructions.text: In a separate bowl combine the tomato purée, ketchup, orange juice, soy sauce, vegan Worcestershire, hot sauce, and lime juice. Whisk together until incorporated
recipeInstructions.name: In a separate bowl combine the tomato purée, ketchup, orange juice, soy sauce, vegan Worcestershire, hot sauce, and lime juice. Whisk together until incorporated

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the sauce over the mix of vegetables and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the sauce over the mix of vegetables and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Let sit in the fridge for at least 30 min. before serving
recipeInstructions.name: Let sit in the fridge for at least 30 min. before serving

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with saltine crackers, chips, or baked tostadas.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with saltine crackers, chips, or baked tostadas.

@graph.keywords: mexican shrimp cocktail, vegan shrimp cocktail
